title.description: The title of the extension. Shown in a number of locations.

titleDesc.message: Shows today's date in the Badíʿ (Wondrous) calendar, the official calendar of the Bahá'í Faith.

1day.description: used in top left 'Upcoming' list, when the event is 1 day in the future

actionSpeakDesc.message: The reminder will be read aloud using this voice:
actionSpeakDesc.description: in edit area when asking for a relative time

am.description: displayed in 'timeFormat12' if not using 24 hours clock

bDatePickerTitle.description: added <u></u> - should have one letter between <u> and </u>

bMonthMeaning.description: Names of days/months, with first one being Ayyam-i-ha

browserActionTitle.description: Shown until the dynamic tip is created

browserMenuOpen.description: shown as menu item when right-clicking on the browser icon

btnJumpToTitle.message: Move forward or backward by this number of days

btnPlannerExportCsv.description: button - export to Comma Separated Value format for import into Excel

btnReminderCancel.description: cancel changes and close the edit area

btnReminderEdit.description: shown next to each reminder. Click to edit the reminder.

btnReminderSave.description: Save the changes and close the edit area

btnReminderSaveNew.description: Save the changes as a new reminder and close the edit area. The original reminder is not affected.

btnReminderTest.description: show a sample of the reminder now

bWeekDayMeaning.description: start with Saturday and a leading comma

bYearInVahidNameAr.description: Arabic names of years in a Vahid, with leading ,

cal2DarkerColors.description: a check box on the calendar. If checked, darker colors are used.

cal2ForPrint.description: a check box on the calendar. If checked, formating is improved for printing.

cal2ShowTimes.description: a check box on the calendar, asking whether sunrise and sunset times should be displayed. If they are not, the calendar is generic for any location.

cal3ForPrint.description: a check box on the calendar. If checked, formating is improved for printing.

cal3ShowTimes.description: a check box on the calendar, asking whether sunrise and sunset times should be displayed. If they are not, the calendar is generic for any location.

Chrome_WebStore.description: link to Webstore when running in Chrome

Chrome_WebStoreSupport.description: link to Webstore support link when running in Chrome

copied.description: short message that replaces sample format button text when button is clicked

currentFocus.description: in wheel, points to today, or whatever day is currently selected

customBuilderEcho.message: Results (for currently selected day - see Tips & Keys to change day)

customBuilderIntro.message:
Type the format into this box. (View Hints)
Click an 'Add' button in the Available Date Parts to insert at the current location.

customFormats.description: in the list of formats at the bottom of of the 'Custom' page

customIntroClick.message: Click 'Copy' to copy formatted date to the clipboard.

customLoadDefaultToolTip.message: Format to show in the Chrome icon tooltip:

customLoadDefaultTopDay.message: Format to show at the top of most pages:

customLoadLetters.message: Click to copy from a standard format:

customSelectForFrontPage.message: Tick box to show on {0} page.

defaultFormat.description: in the list of formats at the bottom of of the 'Custom' page

Ended.description: Shown in the upcoming dates area

eventTime.description: show start time in Events listing

eventTimeHeading1.description: heading in Events listing (if not showing Holy Days)

eventTimeHeading2.description: heading in Events listing (if showing Holy Days)

evePartOfDay.description: show start time in Events listing

example2.message: {bMonthNamePri} {bDay} {dayStartedLower} at sunset (about {startingSunsetDesc}) on {frag1WeekdayLong}, {frag1MonthShort} {frag1Day} and {dayEndedLower} at sunset (about {endingSunsetDesc}) on {frag2WeekdayLong}, {frag2MonthShort} {frag2Day}.

exportCalendarDescription.message: Dates in the Badíʿ Calendar for {location}

exporterDateRange.message: <u>R</u>ange of dates to Export (based on currently selected year)

exporterFastEnd.description: when the fast ends at sunset

exporterFastStart.description: when the fast starts at sunrise
